Lexer

This module provides lexing functionality for the Words programming language.

class words.lexer.lex.Lexer

Lexer, also known as a Tokenizer.

Supplies functionality for reading text from a file and changing them into tokens the parser can accept.

static lex_file(file: Path) → Iterator[LexerToken]

Lex all tokens from a file.

Parameters

file – Path to the file to lex.

Returns

An iterator over lexer tokens.

static lex_line(line: Iterator[Word]) → Iterator[LexerToken]

Lex all words from a line into tokens.

Parameters

line – An iterator over words to lex.

Returns

An iterator of lexer tokens.

static lex_word(word: Word) → LexerToken

Lex a single word.

Parameters

word – The word to lex into a token.

Returns

A lexer token.

Lex Utils

class words.lexer.lex_util.DebugData(line: int, start_pos: Optional[int] = None)

Holds data used during exception handling for debugging purposes.

class words.lexer.lex_util.Word(content: str, debug_data: DebugData)

Wrapper for a word holding the original lexed word and debug data.
